T07D4092-2:151a-2: rtogs sla bar bstan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07D4092-2:151a-3: dper na yang dag par spong ba rnams lta bu
T07D4092-2:151a-4: ste zhes bya ba ni dkar po dang nag po'i
T07D4092-2:151a-5: phyogs dag la so sor skyes pa dang ma skyes
T07D4092-2:151a-6: pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas bstan pa lta bu
T07D4092-2:151a-7: ste / skyes pa ni 'dul ba'i skye bos skyes
T07D4092-2:151a-8: pa rtogs par sla'i ma skyes pa ni ma yin
T07D4092-2:151a-9: ste / pa'am / nag po'i phyogs rtogs par sla bas so //
T07D4092-2:151a-11: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spangs pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do //
T07D4092-2:151a-14: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go //
T07D4092-2:151a-15: ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
T07D4092-2:151a-16: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir
T07D4092-2:151a-17: 'dun pa bskyed do zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin
T07D4092-2:151a-18: no // skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang /
T07D4092-2:151a-19: mi brjod par bya ba dang goms par bya ba'i
T07D4092-2:151a-20: phyir 'dun pa bskyed do zhes bya ba snga ma
T07D4092-2:151a-21: bzhin no // gang sngar ni skyes pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed la /
T07D4092-2:151a-22: phyis ni ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya
T07D4092-2:151a-23: ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa'i nges pa 'di ni
T07D4092-2:151a-24: med do // 'o na ci zhe na /
T07D4092-2:151a-25: sngar yang ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir /
T07D4092-2:151a-26: 'dun pa bskyed la phyis kyang skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed de /
T07D4092-2:151a-27: dper brjod pa ni 'di yin no //
T07D4092-2:151a-28: dge ba'i phyogs la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T07D4092-2:151a-29: bden pa rnams ni mngon par rtogs pa dang mthun
T07D4092-2:151a-30: par bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan
T07D4092-2:151a-31: du na rgyu dang 'bras bu sdug bsngal dang kun
T07D4092-2:151a-32: 'byung ba'i bden pa sngar dang phyis bstan pa dag
T07D4092-2:151a-33: phyis dang sngar bstan par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes
T07D4092-2:151a-35: gang la chags pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la'o //
T07D4092-2:151a-36: gang gis gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis so //
T07D4092-2:151a-37: gang las thar ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa de kho na las te /
T07D4092-2:151a-38: de nyid la dang por te sbyor ba'i gnas skabs su'o //
T07D4092-2:151a-40: rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na zhes bya ba smos so //
T07D4092-2:151a-41: yongs su rtogs pa'i gnas skabs na ste /
T07D4092-2:151a-42: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07D4092-2:151b-0: nad mthong nas zhes bya ba la sogs @151b pa
T07D4092-2:151b-1: 'byung ba la nad ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i
T07D4092-2:151b-2: dpe yin no // de'i gzhi ni kun 'byung gi bden pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:151b-3: de zad pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:151b-4: de'i sman ni lam gyi bden pa'i dpe yin no //
T07D4092-2:151b-5: bden pa rnams kyi dpe 'di ni mdo las kyang
T07D4092-2:151b-6: bstan to zhes bya ba ni nang la sogs pa'i
T07D4092-2:151b-7: mdo las so // ji skad du zhe na /
T07D4092-2:151b-8: yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i sman pa zug rngu
T07D4092-2:151b-9: 'byin pa ni rgyal po'i 'os yin zhing rgyal po'i
T07D4092-2:151b-10: spu la 'bab pa yin la rgyal po'i yan lag
T07D4092-2:151b-12: bzhi po gang dag ce na /
T07D4092-2:151b-14: nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa yin /
T07D4092-2:151b-15: nad spong ba la mkhas pa yin nad spangs nas phyir mi skye ba la mkhas pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:151b-16: de bzhin du yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i de
T07D4092-2:151b-17: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
T07D4092-2:151b-18: pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa
T07D4092-2:151b-19: bla na med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T07D4092-2:151b-20: bzhi po gang dag ce na /
T07D4092-2:151b-21: dge slong dag 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T07D4092-2:151b-22: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
T07D4092-2:151b-23: ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes
T07D4092-2:151b-24: bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T07D4092-2:151b-28: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags
T07D4092-2:151b-29: pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji
T07D4092-2:151b-30: lta ba bzhin du mkhyen to zhes 'byung ba yin
T07D4092-2:151b-31: no // sngar 'phangs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi shugs kyis so //
T07D4092-2:151b-32: dkyus bstan pa'i rta thags thogs med par rgyug pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T07D4092-2:151b-33: rta ji ltar dkyus kyis bstan pa la 'gyur ba med par rgyug pa de dang 'dra'o //
T07D4092-2:151b-34: kha cig ni thags thogs med par dkyus snyol ba bzhin no zhes 'don to //
T07D4092-2:151b-35: rdzas su yang bye brag yod de zhes bya ba
T07D4092-2:151b-36: la yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ming gi sgo
T07D4092-2:151b-37: nas kyang zhes bstan pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:151b-38: phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar de ni 'phags pa rnams dang /
T07D4092-2:151b-39: gzhan dag la yang phyin ci ma log pa ste /
T07D4092-2:151b-40: sdug bsngal la sogs pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T07D4092-2:151b-41: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni bden pa 'di dag ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du gzigs te /
T07D4092-2:151b-42: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la yang sdug bsngal dang /
T07D4092-2:152a-3: de bzhin du lam gyi bden pa la yang lam dang rigs pa dang /
T07D4092-2:152a-5: nges par 'byin pa'i bar du gzigs kyi 'phags pa
T07D4092-2:152a-6: ma yin pa gzhan dag gis ni de ltar mthong
T07D4092-2:152a-7: ba ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni 'phags
T07D4092-2:152a-8: pa rnams kyi bden pa zhes bya'i /
T07D4092-2:152a-9: 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi bden pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
T07D4092-2:152a-11: phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:152a-12: de dag gis ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la
T07D4092-2:152a-13: ni bde'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par
T07D4092-2:152a-14: mthong la / kun 'byung ba la ni kun 'byung
T07D4092-2:152a-15: pa ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs par
T07D4092-2:152a-16: mthong la / mthong ngo // 'gog pa la ni
T07D4092-2:152a-17: 'gog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs
T07D4092-2:152a-18: mthong la / mthong ngo // par ro // lam
T07D4092-2:152a-19: la ni lam ma yin no zhes bya ba la
T07D4092-2:152a-21: de ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal rig / ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T07D4092-2:152a-22: 'gog pa'i bden pa ni yang srid pa med pa'i phyir /
T07D4092-2:152a-23: g-yang sa bzhin du byis pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa yin pas so //
T07D4092-2:152a-24: 'phags pas sdug bsngal rig ces bya ba ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
T07D4092-2:152a-25: gnyis ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin la zhes bya ba sdug bsngal dang /
T07D4092-2:152a-26: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dag ste /
T07D4092-2:152a-27: phyin ci ma log par gzigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:152a-28: gnyis ni 'phags pa yang yin te /
T07D4092-2:152a-29: dge ba'i phyir dang zag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:152a-30: 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yang yin te /
T07D4092-2:152a-31: phyin ci ma log par gzigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:152a-32: de ltar na gcig lus par bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4092-2:152a-33: 'phags pa'i bden pa dag ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
T07D4092-2:152a-34: gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug bsngal gyi
T07D4092-2:152a-35: rang bzhin yin pa zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i
T07D4092-2:152a-36: phung po'i phyogs gcig po sdug bsngal dang /
T07D4092-2:152a-37: yid mi bde ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
T07D4092-2:152a-38: ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo //
T07D4092-2:152a-40: ci rigs pa'i don ni yid du 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang /
T07D4092-2:152a-41: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba yin no //
T07D4092-2:152a-42: yid du mi 'od ba rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /
T07D4092-2:152a-43: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis so //
T07D4092-2:152a-44: de dag las gzhan pa rnams ni 'du byed kyi
T07D4092-2:152b-0: sdug bsngal kho nas so @152b zhes bya ba yin
T07D4092-2:152b-1: no // yid du 'thad pas na yid du 'ong ba rnams so //
T07D4092-2:152b-2: de dag las gzhan pa rnams zhes bya ba ni yid du 'ong ba dang /
T07D4092-2:152b-3: yid du mi 'ong ba dag las gzhan pa rnams so //
T07D4092-2:152b-4: tshor ba gsum dang go rims bzhin te zhes bya
T07D4092-2:152b-5: ba ni tshor ba bde ba ni yid du 'ong
T07D4092-2:152b-7: sdug bsngal ba ni yid du mi 'ong pa dag yin no //
T07D4092-2:152b-8: bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma
T07D4092-2:152b-9: yin pa ni yid du 'ong ba yang ma yin
T07D4092-2:152b-10: / yid du mi 'ong ba dag kyang ma yin
T07D4092-2:152b-11: pa dag yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T07D4092-2:152b-12: / // de'i dbang gis zhes bya ba ni tshor
T07D4092-2:152b-13: ba'i dbang gis te gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i
T07D4092-2:152b-14: tshor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa rnams kyang de
T07D4092-2:152b-16: yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'i ming 'thob bo //
T07D4092-2:152b-17: 'gyur bas sdug bsngal ba nyid ces bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:152b-18: mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i
T07D4092-2:152b-20: kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs tshal //
T07D4092-2:152b-21: kyi hud mtshe'u dang dal gyis 'bab //
T07D4092-2:152b-22: kyi hud sdug pa rnam shes lha //
T07D4092-2:152b-23: smre sngags 'don bzhin sa la lhung //
T07D4092-2:152b-25: sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo kho nas zhes bya ba
T07D4092-2:152b-26: ni gnod pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nas zhes bya

T07D4092-2:152b-32: de lta yin na ni mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T07D4092-2:152b-33: 'di ni 'di'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
T07D4092-2:152b-35: sun dbyung ba'i phyir nye bar bstan par zad do //
T07D4092-2:152b-36: yang na de lta yin du zad de de ni
T07D4092-2:152b-37: ngo bo gang gis rnam par sun 'byin pa de
T07D4092-2:152b-38: nyid la ltos nas sdug bsngal kho na yin te
T07D4092-2:152b-39: / dper na bde ba'i tshor ba skye ba dang /
T07D4092-2:152b-40: gnas pa na bde ba'i phyir bde ba yin du
T07D4092-2:152b-41: zin kyang rnam par sun dbyung bar bya ba nyid
T07D4092-2:152b-43: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba yin
T07D4092-2:152b-44: no zhes de ltar rnam par sun 'byin par byed
T07D4092-2:152b-45: pa dang 'dra'o // 'du byed kho nas sdug bsngal
T07D4092-2:152b-46: ba nyid ces bya ba ni 'du byed kho nas

T07D4092-2:152b-48: gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin
T07D4092-2:152b-49: no zhes bya ba ni gang zhig nges par mi
T07D4092-2:152b-50: gnas pa de ni sdug bsngal ba ste /
T07D4092-2:153a-1: 'jig pa de sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4092-2:153a-2: de'i phyir rkyen gyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4092-2:153a-3: gang gi phyir rkyen gyis mngon par 'du byed pa de'i phyir sdug bsngal ba zhes bya'o //
T07D4092-2:153a-4: de myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang tshor
T07D4092-2:153a-5: ba dang 'dra bar brjod do zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:153a-6: bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed
T07D4092-2:153a-7: rnams ni 'gyur bas sdug bsngal ba nyid de /
T07D4092-2:153a-8: bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams ni skye ba na yang bde /
T07D4092-2:153a-9: gnas pa na yang bde la /
T07D4092-2:153a-10: 'gyur ba na sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /
T07D4092-2:153a-11: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du
T07D4092-2:153a-12: byed rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo
T07D4092-2:153a-13: kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de /
T07D4092-2:153a-14: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams ni skye ba yang sdug bsngal la /
T07D4092-2:153a-15: gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /
T07D4092-2:153a-16: bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma

T07D4092-2:153a-19: 'du byed kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de zhes
T07D4092-2:153a-21: sdug bsngal nyid sdug bsngal nyid yin pas zhes bya
T07D4092-2:153a-22: ba la yin pa'i bar zhes 'byung ba'i phyir 'gyur
T07D4092-2:153a-23: ba nyid sdug bsngal ba nyid yin pas 'gyur ba'i
T07D4092-2:153a-25: 'du byed nyid sdug bsngal nyid yin pas 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid do zhes brjod par bya'o //
T07D4092-2:153a-26: rnam grangs 'di ni tshig rnam par sbyar ba kho
T07D4092-2:153a-27: nas khyad par du gyur par zad kyi don gyis
T07D4092-2:153a-28: ni ma yin pas 'dir don ni de kho na
T07D4092-2:153a-29: gzung bar bya'o // thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir
T07D4092-2:153a-30: zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'du byed
T07D4092-2:153a-31: yid du 'ong ba rnams ni sdug bsngal nyid dang
T07D4092-2:153a-33: de'i phyir de dag ni thun mong ma yin pas 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid du bshad do //
T07D4092-2:153a-34: yid du mi 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang thun mong ma yin te /
T07D4092-2:153a-35: de'i phyir de dag ni thun mong ma yin pas
T07D4092-2:153a-36: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid du bshad do zhes
T07D4092-2:153a-38: yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa 'du byed thams
T07D4092-2:153a-39: cad ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug
T07D4092-2:153a-41: de ni khyab ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:153b-0: gal te thams cad kyang de ltar sdug bsngal ba @153b yin na /
T07D4092-2:153b-1: ci'i phyir kun gyis mi mthong zhe na /
T07D4092-2:153b-3: de dag kyang 'phags pa rnams kho nas gzigs kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
T07D4092-2:153b-5: 'dir smras pa zhes pa 'di thams cad nye bar 'god par byed do //
T07D4092-2:153b-6: de lta na 'o na ni zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:153b-7: gal te 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis 'du
T07D4092-2:153b-8: byed thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na ni
T07D4092-2:153b-9: / lam yang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
T07D4092-2:153b-10: rkyen gyis bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07D4092-2:153b-11: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mthun
T07D4092-2:153b-12: pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan kho
T07D4092-2:153b-14: sngar rkyen gyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa yin la /
T07D4092-2:153b-15: gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin
T07D4092-2:153b-16: no zhes bshad pas lam yang rkyen gyis mngon par
T07D4092-2:153b-19: de lta bas na sdug bsngal ba yin no zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T07D4092-2:153b-20: gal te sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa
T07D4092-2:153b-21: kho na yin par 'dod na ni sngar bshad pa
T07D4092-2:153b-22: de mtshan nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T07D4092-2:153b-23: ji ste de sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid yin na ni /
T07D4092-2:153b-24: 'di mtshan nyid ma yin no zhe na de ni nyes pa med do //
T07D4092-2:153b-25: ji lta zhe na 'dir dgongs pa'i don ni mi
T07D4092-2:153b-26: rtag pa gang zhig 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun
T07D4092-2:153b-27: pa de sdug bsngal ba yin no zhes bya ba
T07D4092-2:153b-28: 'di yin no // 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T07D4092-2:153b-29: zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gang yin pa'o //
T07D4092-2:153b-30: yang ci'i phyir zag pa med pa'i lam yang de
T07D4092-2:153b-31: kho na dang 'dra bar mi rtag pa yin bzhin
T07D4092-2:153b-32: du yang 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun ba ma
T07D4092-2:153b-33: yin zhe na / de'i phyir de skye ba ni

T07D4092-2:153b-35: pa rnams dang mi mthun pa med do zhes bya
T07D4092-2:153b-36: yin zhe na / ba smos so // 'jig rten
T07D4092-2:153b-37: na khyad par med par brjod kyang khyad par rtog
T07D4092-2:153b-38: yin zhe na / ba smos so // pa mthong
T07D4092-2:153b-39: ste / dper na 'gro bas na ba lang ngo
T07D4092-2:153b-40: zhes bya bar 'gro bas na ma he yang ba
T07D4092-2:153b-41: lang du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya
T07D4092-2:153b-42: yin zhe na / ba smos so // pa mthong

T07D4092-2:173b-22: drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas dag gi'o //
T07D4092-2:173b-23: chung ngu'i tshe ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /
T07D4092-2:173b-24: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
T07D4092-2:173b-25: tshangs pa chen por skye ba rnams kyi'o //
T07D4092-2:173b-26: chen po'i tshe ni zam dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa'i lus rnams kyi'o //
T07D4092-2:173b-27: chen po nyid kyi tshe ni srid pa brgyad pa la sogs pa ste /
T07D4092-2:173b-28: srid pa brgyad pa la sogs pa dang /
T07D4092-2:173b-29: dgu pa la sogs pa dang /
T07D4092-2:173b-30: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i mi skye ba'i chos nyid 'thob bo //
T07D4092-2:173b-31: rigs de nyid ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyi gzhung lugs yin te /
T07D4092-2:173b-32: bzod pas yongs su bsgos pa'i nyan thos kyi rigs te /
T07D4092-2:173b-33: de ni bzod pas yongs su bsgos pa nyid kyis
T07D4092-2:173b-34: bzlog tu mi rung ba'i phyir ro snyam du bsams
T07D4092-2:173b-35: pa'o // gzhan gsum yang zhes bya ba ni rang
T07D4092-2:173b-36: sangs rgyas su ni nyan thos kyi rigs las bzod
T07D4092-2:173b-38: de dag ni gzhan gyi don du ngan song du
T07D4092-2:173b-39: mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin
T07D4092-2:173b-40: no // ting nge 'dzin mi g-yo ba dang /
T07D4092-2:173b-41: gsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skyon brgyad las
T07D4092-2:173b-42: grol ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mi g-yo ba yin
T07D4092-2:173b-43: no // de nyid kyi phyir ram dbang po rnon po'i phyir gsal zhing sbyangs pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:174a-1: bse ru lta bu las gzhan pa'i rang sangs rgyas
T07D4092-2:174a-2: yod par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni chos mngon
T07D4092-2:174a-3: pa pa gang dag gi gzhung lugs kyis bse ru
T07D4092-2:174a-4: lta bu las gzhan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyang yod
T07D4092-2:174a-6: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa tsam bskyed
T07D4092-2:174a-7: pa tshogs shing spyod pa'i rang sangs rgyas so snyam
T07D4092-2:174a-9: de dag gi ltar na de'i rigs dro bar gyur pa dang /
T07D4092-2:174a-10: rtse mo rnams ni zlog par dgag pa med de /
T07D4092-2:174a-11: bse ru lta bu kho na dmigs kyis bkar ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:174a-12: myur ba srid pa gsum gyis thar //
T07D4092-2:174a-13: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig thar pa myur bar
T07D4092-2:174a-14: thob pa de tshe gcig la ni thar pa'i cha
T07D4092-2:174a-15: dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed
T07D4092-2:174a-16: do // gnyis pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so //
T07D4092-2:174a-17: gsum pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam mo //
T07D4092-2:174a-18: gang zhig tshe snga ma la thar pa'i cha dang
T07D4092-2:174a-19: mthun pa'i tshogs bsags pa de ni tshe gcig kho
T07D4092-2:174a-20: na la yang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun
T07D4092-2:174a-21: pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed do zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
T07D4092-2:174a-22: sa bon 'debs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T07D4092-2:174a-23: pa 'byung ba ni sa bon 'debs pa lta bu'i
T07D4092-2:174a-24: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa skye ba yin no
T07D4092-2:174a-25: // 'bru skye ba lta bu ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa skye ba yin no //
T07D4092-2:174a-26: 'bras bu chags pa lta bu ni 'phags pa'i lam yin no //
T07D4092-2:174a-27: chos nyid 'di la zhes bya ba ni gsung rab kyi chos nyid la'o //
T07D4092-2:174a-28: 'jug pa dang yongs su smin pa dang rnam par
T07D4092-2:174a-29: grol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni don gyi dngos
T07D4092-2:174a-30: yin te / 'jug pa ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pas so //
T07D4092-2:174a-31: yongs su smin pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams kyis so //
T07D4092-2:174a-32: rnam par grol ba ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis so //
T07D4092-2:174a-33: de'i smon lam gyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir zhes
T07D4092-2:174a-34: bya ba ni yid kyi smon lam gyis yongs su
T07D4092-2:174a-36: smon lam ni sems pa'i khyad par yin no //
T07D4092-2:174a-37: zas 'ga' tsam byin nas zhes bya ba ni lus kyi las yin no//
T07D4092-2:174a-38: bslab pa 'ga' tsam yang mnos nas zhes bya ba ni ngag gi las yin te /
T07D4092-2:174a-39: de dag kyang yid kyi las kyi kun nas bslang bas las gsum gyi rang bzhin yin no //
T07D4092-2:174a-40: 'di ni chung ngu zin kyang thar pa 'dod pa'i
T07D4092-2:174a-41: stobs skyed pa las thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i
T07D4092-2:174b-0: thar pa'i cha ni thar pa'i cha ste @174b thar pa 'thob pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:174b-1: de la phan pa ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya'o //
T07D4092-2:174b-2: gzhan nas ni ma yin te /
T07D4092-2:174b-3: ci rigs par shes rab dang /
T07D4092-2:174b-4: skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:174b-5: re zhig sgra mi snyan dag na ni gnyi ga
T07D4092-2:174b-6: med do // ngan song dag na ni skyo ba yod la shes rab med do //
T07D4092-2:174b-7: lha dag gi nang na ni skyo ba med la shes rab yod de /
T07D4092-2:174b-8: de'i phyir mi rnams kyi nang kho na dang gling
T07D4092-2:174b-9: gsum nas 'phen gyi gzhan nas ni ma yin no
T07D4092-2:174b-10: // mngon par rtogs pa'i rim par bshad par brtsams pa zhes bya ba ni /
T07D4092-2:174b-11: tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa //
T07D4092-2:174b-12: bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor //
T07D4092-2:174b-13: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T07D4092-2:174b-14: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i go rims dang /
T07D4092-2:174b-15: de'i zhar la thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:174b-16: chos kyi bzod pa zag pa med //
T07D4092-2:174b-17: ces bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
T07D4092-2:174b-18: mthun pa rnams kyis kyang chos la bzod pas de'i
T07D4092-2:174b-19: phyir rgyu mthun pas khyad par du bya ste /
T07D4092-2:174b-20: gang gi rgyu mthun pa chos shes pa yin pa de ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:174b-21: chos shes pa'i phyir bzod pa ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa ste /
T07D4092-2:174b-22: me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin no zhes bya
T07D4092-2:174b-23: ba ni dper na me tog gi ched kyi shing
T07D4092-2:174b-24: la me tog gi shing zhes bya ba dang /
T07D4092-2:174b-25: 'bras bu'i ched kyi shing la 'bras bu'i shing zhes bya ba dang 'dra'o //
T07D4092-2:174b-26: tshig le 'ur byas pa las chos kyi bzod pa
T07D4092-2:174b-27: zhes smos pa ni phyogs gcig smos pa'i phyir te
T07D4092-2:174b-28: / dper na lhas byin la lhas byin zhes bya ba dang 'dra'o //
T07D4092-2:174b-29: yang dag pa nyid ni mdo las mya ngan las
T07D4092-2:174b-30: 'das pa yin par bshad do zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:174b-31: yang dag pa nyid gang zhe na /
T07D4092-2:174b-32: gang zhig 'dod chags yongs su gtugs te /
T07D4092-2:174b-33: spangs pa de yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
T07D4092-2:174b-34: de nges pa ni nges pa ste zhes bya ba
T07D4092-2:174b-35: ni yang dag pa nyid der nges shing gcig tu
T07D4092-2:174b-36: gyur pa ni nges pa zhes bya'o //
T07D4092-2:174b-37: der 'jug pa ni mngon par 'gro ba ste zhes
T07D4092-2:174b-38: bya ba ni gcig tu gyur pa der 'jug pa
T07D4092-2:174b-40: de ltar na phyin ci ma log par 'jug pa'i phyir nges par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T07D4092-2:174b-41: de skyes na zhes bya ba ni chos shes pa la bzod pa'o //
T07D4092-2:174b-42: mar me dang skye ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mar me bzhin dang /
T07D4092-2:174b-43: skye ba bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T07D4092-2:174b-44: dper na mar me ma 'ongs pa mun pa bsal bar nus pa dang /
T07D4092-2:175a-1: ma 'ongs pa bskyed par bya ba skyed par nus
T07D4092-2:175a-2: pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i
T07D4092-2:175a-3: bzod pa ma 'ongs pas kyang so so'i skye bo
T07D4092-2:175a-4: nyid bzlog par nus par khas len gyi byed pa
T07D4092-2:175a-5: gzhan nyon mongs pa spong ba ni ma yin no
T07D4092-2:175a-6: // gzhan dag na re 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi
T07D4092-2:175a-7: mchog rnams kyis bzlog go zhes zer ro zhes bya
T07D4092-2:175a-8: ba ni so so'i skye bo nyid zlog par byed
T07D4092-2:175a-9: do zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
T07D4092-2:175a-10: ma yin te de'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro zhes
T07D4092-2:175a-11: bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams
T07D4092-2:175a-12: kyis de zlog par byed do zhes bya ba de
T07D4092-2:175a-13: ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T07D4092-2:175a-14: ci'i phyir zhe na de dag so so'i skye bo'i
T07D4092-2:175a-15: chos yin no so so'i skye bo'i chos kyis so
T07D4092-2:175a-16: so'i skye bo chos ji ltar bzlog par 'gyur /
T07D4092-2:175a-17: de dang 'gal ba'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes
T07D4092-2:175a-18: bya ba ni chos kyi mchog rnams ni so so'i
T07D4092-2:175a-19: skye ba nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir de ni nyes
T07D4092-2:175a-20: pa med do // dper na ci dang 'dra zhe na /
T07D4092-2:175a-21: dgra bo'i phrag pa la zhon nas de la 'tshog pa bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4092-2:175a-22: dper na 'ga' zhig gis dgra bo'i phrag pa la
T07D4092-2:175a-23: zhon la dgra bo nyid la 'tshog par byed pa
T07D4092-2:175a-24: de bzhin du chos kyi mchog rnams kyis kyang dgra
T07D4092-2:175a-25: bo so so'i skye bo nyid kyi phrag pa la
T07D4092-2:175a-26: zhon te / so so'i skye bo nyid de kho na la 'joms par byed do zhes grag go //
T07D4092-2:175a-27: gzhan dag na re gnyi gas zlog ste zhes bya
T07D4092-2:175a-28: ba ni so so'i skye bo nyid 'jig rten pa'i
T07D4092-2:175a-30: bzod pas kyang zlog go zhe'o //
T07D4092-2:175a-32: bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam
T07D4092-2:175a-33: dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos
T07D4092-2:175a-34: te / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams ni
T07D4092-2:175a-35: bar chad med pa'i lam dang chos mthun pa yin
T07D4092-2:175a-36: te / no // bzod pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam dang chos mthun pa yin te /
T07D4092-2:175a-37: dper na bar chad med pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs
T07D4092-2:175a-38: pa spong bar byed la rnam par grol ba'i lam
T07D4092-2:175a-39: gyis spangs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i chos
T07D4092-2:175a-40: kyi mchog rnams kyis so so'i skye bo nyid rnam
T07D4092-2:175a-41: par nyams par byed la bzod pas rnam par nyams
T07D4092-2:175a-42: pa yin no // de ni sdug bsngal la chos
T07D4092-2:175a-43: shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos
T07D4092-2:175a-44: las ming des tha snyad 'dogs so zhes bya bar
T07D4092-2:175a-45: pa yin no // ston te / thams cad du
T07D4092-2:175a-46: yang zag pa med pa'i skabs yin zhes bya ba
T07D4092-2:175a-47: pa yin no // ston te / ni de'i phyir
T07D4092-2:175a-48: / de nas ni de nyid la chos shes zhes
T07D4092-2:175a-49: bya ba zag pa med par zhes bya bar mngon
T07D4092-2:175a-50: pa yin no // ston te / ni de'i phyir
T07D4092-2:175b-0: / no // @175b spyi la dmigs pa zhes bya
T07D4092-2:175b-1: ba ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i
T07D4092-2:175b-2: sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:175b-3: dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na nyid
T07D4092-2:175b-4: shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dang po sdug
T07D4092-2:175b-5: bsngal la sogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid
T07D4092-2:175b-6: shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T07D4092-2:175b-7: de'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:175b-8: de'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don
T07D4092-2:175b-9: to // de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes
T07D4092-2:175b-10: bya ba ni ji ltar chos shes pas sdug bsngal
T07D4092-2:175b-11: la sogs pa'i bden pa la sdug bsngal la sogs
T07D4092-2:175b-12: pa'i rnam par rtogs shing yongs su shes pa kho
T07D4092-2:175b-13: na bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod
T07D4092-2:175b-14: pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa yang rtogs pa'i phyir
T07D4092-2:175b-15: rjes su shes pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:175b-16: de bzhin du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba
T07D4092-2:175b-17: ni de bzhin du mjug thogs su skye ba'i rim
T07D4092-2:175b-18: gyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun
T07D4092-2:175b-19: 'byung lhag ma la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa
T07D4092-2:175b-20: dang zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o //
T07D4092-2:175b-21: sde pa gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa chos srung ba'i sde pa la sogs pa'o //
T07D4092-2:175b-22: bye brag med par ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T07D4092-2:175b-23: de ltar bden pa mngon rtogs 'di //
T07D4092-2:175b-24: sems bcu drug go zhes bya ba mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T07D4092-2:175b-25: dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T07D4092-2:175b-26: bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin te /
T07D4092-2:175b-27: de ltar na sems bcu drug ces bya ba ni bye brag med pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:175b-28: mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:175b-29: mthong ba nyid mngon par rtogs pa yin te dmigs
T07D4092-2:175b-30: pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T07D4092-2:175b-31: bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
T07D4092-2:175b-32: mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T07D4092-2:175b-33: dge slong dag zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis
T07D4092-2:175b-34: mthong ba gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o zhes
T07D4092-2:175b-35: 'byung bas shes rab nyid mthong ba yin no zhes
T07D4092-2:175b-36: bya bar rnam par gzhan go //
T07D4092-2:175b-37: dmigs pa zhes bya ba smos pa ni de dang
T07D4092-2:175b-38: mtshungs par ldan pa tshor ba la sogs pas kyang
T07D4092-2:175b-39: mngon par rtogs pa yin no //
T07D4092-2:175b-40: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni shes rab kyis kyang yin te /
T07D4092-2:175b-41: 'di ltar sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis bden pa dag la dmigs par byed do //
T07D4092-2:175b-42: bya ba ni bden pa gang zhig la bya ba gang yin pa ste /
T07D4092-2:175b-43: 'di lta ste sdug bsngal la yongs su shes pa dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-2: 'gog pa la mngon sum du bya ba dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-4: de dang ldan pa ma yin pa tshul khrims dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-5: skye ba la sogs pas kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T07D4092-2:176a-6: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag gis kyang yin te /
T07D4092-2:176a-7: bya ba bzhi po ni shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-8: ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyis byed pas so //
T07D4092-2:176a-9: skye ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T07D4092-2:176a-10: pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni mtshan nyid gzhan dang
T07D4092-2:176a-12: sdug bsngal mthong na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung
T07D4092-2:176a-13: ba ni shes rab kyis sdug bsngal mthong na mngon
T07D4092-2:176a-15: sdug bsngal de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni ji skad bshad pa gsum mo //
T07D4092-2:176a-16: kun 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba ni kun 'byung ba dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-18: lam rnams kyi ni bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin te /
T07D4092-2:176a-19: spong ba dang mngon sum du byed pa dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-21: go rims bzhin du kun 'byung ba ni spong ba ste /
T07D4092-2:176a-22: nyon mongs pa'i thob pa chad pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:176a-23: 'gog pa ni mngon sum du byed de /
T07D4092-2:176a-24: thob pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:176a-26: mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4092-2:176a-27: rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
T07D4092-2:176a-28: sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa
T07D4092-2:176a-29: ni re re zhing tha dad pa'i phyir te /
T07D4092-2:176a-30: de dag gi rnam pa'i tha dad pas kun 'byung
T07D4092-2:176a-31: ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam par mthong
T07D4092-2:176a-32: ba ni rung ba ma yin no //
T07D4092-2:176a-33: 'on te sde pa gzhan dag chos thams cad kyi
T07D4092-2:176a-34: spyi'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bdag med pa
T07D4092-2:176a-36: bden pa thams cad bdag med pa'i rnam par mthong
T07D4092-2:176a-37: ngo zhes zer na ni 'o na ni bden pa
T07D4092-2:176a-38: rnams / sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang /
T07D4092-2:176a-39: 'gog pa dang lam zhes bya ba lta bur sdug bsngal la sogs par mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T07D4092-2:176a-40: de lta yin na ni thams cad bdag med pa'i
T07D4092-2:176a-41: rnam par mthong ngo zhes smra ba mdo dang 'gal
T07D4092-2:176a-42: te / 'di ltar mdo las ni 'di skad du /
T07D4092-2:176a-43: 'phags pa nyan thos zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
T07D4092-2:176a-44: 'on te mdo dang 'gal ba med de /
T07D4092-2:176a-45: 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos sdug bsngal la sdug
T07D4092-2:176a-46: bsngal du yid la byed pa 'am zhes bya ba
T07D4092-2:176b-0: la sogs @176b pa 'byung ba ni mngon par rtogs

T07D4092-2:273a-8: 'dra bar snying rje bar byed de /

T07D4092-2:332b-23: mi mang pos bgrod kyang bsgribs pa nyid dang /
T07D4092-2:332b-24: phye yang lta ba po'i mig dman pa nyid do //
T07D4092-2:332b-25: de dag las 'dir lam 'di mi mthong ba'i rgyur ni lta ba po'o //
T07D4092-2:332b-26: nyes pa kho nas lam ma mthong gi lam gyi
T07D4092-2:332b-27: nyes pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gcig
T07D4092-2:332b-29: 'dir mig dman pa des 'di mi mthong zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
T07D4092-2:332b-30: de ltar 'di ni phyogs tsam zhig ces bya ba thams cad 'byung ba la /
T07D4092-2:332b-31: de ltar zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa ltar ro //
T07D4092-2:332b-32: phyogs nyid phyogs tsam ste tsam zhes bya ba ni nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T07D4092-2:332b-33: yang na 'di la phyogs tsam yod pas na phyogs tsam ste /
T07D4092-2:332b-34: chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po las nyung du
T07D4092-2:332b-35: 'di dag gis bstan to zhes bya ba tshig lhag
T07D4092-2:332b-36: ma yin no // su dag la zhe na shin
T07D4092-2:332b-37: tu mkhas pa rnams la zhes bya ba ste dam
T07D4092-2:332b-38: pa rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4092-2:332b-40: rang gi mthu yis rnam 'phel ba'i //
T07D4092-2:332b-41: dug la rma yi phyogs bzhin du //
T07D4092-2:333a-0: ji ltar 'ga' zhig gi dug ni nang gi mthus rma'i phyogs khyab nas yan @333a * //
T07D4092-2:333a-1: lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi nang du 'phel
T07D4092-2:333a-2: bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas ji ltar na
T07D4092-2:333a-4: de'i rma 'byin pa de bzhin du shin tu mkhas
T07D4092-2:333a-5: pa rnams ni rang gi mthus 'phel ba'i phyir dug
T07D4092-2:333a-7: de bas na shin tu mkhas pa mgo smos pas
T07D4092-2:333a-8: go ba shes rab can de dag la bdag gis
T07D4092-2:333a-9: ji ltar na gzhung nyung dus chos mngon pa'i bstan
T07D4092-2:333a-10: bcos chen po kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i
T07D4092-2:333a-11: lugs grub pa don gyi sgo nas rtogs par 'gyur
T07D4092-2:333a-13: gzhan dag na re 'di ni phyogs tsam zhig ces
T07D4092-2:333a-14: bya ba 'di ni bdag med par dgag pa 'di
T07D4092-2:333a-15: kho na'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa yin te
T07D4092-2:333a-16: / bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni //
T07D4092-2:333a-17: kha che bye brag smra'i tshul grub pa bshad //
T07D4092-2:333a-18: ces bya ba 'di nyid kyis don de bshad zin pa de'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T07D4092-2:333a-19: mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa dang 'grel pa gang zag
T07D4092-2:333a-20: rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa 'di yang rdzogs so
T07D4092-2:333a-22: / // / chos mngon sna tshogs don gyi za ma tog
T07D4092-2:333a-23: / chos mngon mdzod 'di rnam par phye ba yi
T07D4092-2:333a-24: // dge ba bdag gis thob pa gang yin des //
T07D4092-2:333a-25: 'jig rten kun gyi bde ba 'byung gyur cig / bstan bcos padma mtsho las skyes pa gtsang //
T07D4092-2:333a-26: bdud rtsi'i ro rmad byung ba sred sel gnas gyur pa //
T07D4092-2:333a-27: bdag gi bshad tshig nyi zer dag gis gsal byas 'di //
T07D4092-2:333a-28: skye bo mkhas pa'i bung ba rnams kyis brten par
T07D4092-2:333a-29: shog / gang gis bstan bcos thams cad rtogs gyur
T07D4092-2:333a-30: nas // mkhas pa'i grags thob grags pa'i bshes gnyen des //
T07D4092-2:333a-31: rnam par bshad pa gzhan la ma mgu nas //
T07D4092-2:333a-32: rnam par bshad pa 'di ni byas pa yin //
T07D4092-2:333a-33: de yis rnam par bshad pa 'di //
T07D4092-2:333a-34: dpal dang tshig gi bdag po ste //
T07D4092-2:333a-35: dam pa'i don lung don gnyer ba //
T07D4092-2:333a-36: lha sku lha dang 'dra phyir byas //
T07D4092-2:333a-37: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi 'grel bshad don gsal ba
T07D4092-2:333a-38: zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal po'i sras grags pa'i
T07D4092-2:333a-39: bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T07D4092-2:333a-41: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sim ha dang /
T07D4092-2:333a-42: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
T07D4092-2:333a-43: 'di la shloka ni khri brgyad stong yod do //
